### Government Tender Announcement: Ship-Based Chemical Detection System
#### Tender Details
| **Tender ID** | `cb-132-49535983` |
| --- | --- |
| **Amendment Number** | 3 |
| **Publication Date** | October 13, 2023 |
| **Tender Closing Date** | November 10, 2023 (16:00:00) |

#### Description
The Government of Canada invites responses to a Request for Information (RFI) for the procurement of a Ship-Based Chemical Detection System for the Canadian Surface Combatant (CSC) ships. The CSC is part of the government's defence policy, which aims to replace retiring Iroquois-class Destroyers and Halifax-class frigates with 15 new ships.

The system will be integrated with the ship's Integrated Platform Management System and will detect chemical agents to support various operations, including combat, counter-terrorism, search and rescue, and law enforcement.

#### Key Objectives
- Deliver decisive combat power at sea
- Support the Canadian Armed Forces and allies ashore
- Conduct interdiction and embargo operations for medium-intensity operations
- Provide humanitarian aid, search and rescue, and law enforcement support for regional engagements

#### Notice of Tender

This request for information aims to identify potential suppliers who have previously designed and/or installed Ship-Based Chemical Detection Systems. Responses are expected to be submitted in English or French.

**Respondent Information**

The contracting officer for this tender is Benjamin Hoar, and his contact information is as follows:
- Email: [PMOCSCPFM-BGPNCCGAF@forces.gc.ca](mailto:PMOCSCPFM-BGPNCCGAF@forces.gc.ca)
- Phone: (613) 698-5456

The responding documents are made available at the following link:
- English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22078/w847s-100032-chemical-detection-rfi-pmo-csc.pdf
- French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/22078/w847s-100032-fr_chemical-detection-rfi-pmo-csc_1.pdf

**Important Date**
The tender closing date is November 10, 2023, at 16:00:00.

Contact information for the contracting officer can be found above.
